com.atc.simulator.vectors

Class SphericalCoordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • pythagoras.d.Vector3
      • com.atc.simulator.vectors.SphericalCoordinate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IVector3
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeographicCoordinate

    public class SphericalCoordinate
extends Vector3
    Created by luke on 9/04/16. See: http://mathworld.wolfram.com/SphericalCoordinates.html The normal range for the variables is as follows: r (0 -> infinity) theta (0 -> 2PI) phi (0 -> PI)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
